body.head: Heresies Personography
body.p: Contributors to Heresies, Issue 1: Feminism, Art and Politics

person.idno: If known, replace this text with an available URI from an authority like VIAF, Wikidata, etc. - otherwise remove element.
If known, replace this text with an available URI from an authority like VIAF, Wikidata, etc. - otherwise remove element.
person.persName: Replace this text with person's name in "preferred" format - Surname, Forename

persName.name: Replace this text with person's forename
If known, replace this text with person's middlename, birthname, etc. - otherwise remove element.
Replace this text with person's surname
persName.genName: Generational name such as, the IIIrd, senior, junior, etc.) - otherwide remove element.
persName.roleName: Role, offical title or rank - otherwide remove element.

birth.date: Add Date of Birth if known. Edit tag to add standard date form value with @when attribute.
Add Date of Death if known. Edit tag to add standard date form value with @when attribute.

person.sex: If you wish to express the person's gender identity or sexual orientation, we encourage you to look for a term in the LINCS Project's gender vocabulary. Edit tag to include the @source and @value attributes (replacing current values), and replace this text with yours.
person.occupation: If known, add one or more occupations in which this person engaged. We encourage you to look for a term in the LINCS Project's occupation vocabulary; edit the tag to include @type (replacing current value), and replace this text with yours.

bibl.title: Provide title of resource here then edit tag, include the source (e.g., WorldCat), provide a reference for the Resource_URI of the subject, and replace this text with yours.

If known, replace this text with person's middlename, birthname, etc. - otherwise remove element.
